title: Can I get a refund from Grammarly?
content:
You can cancel your paid Grammarly account at any time. However, as outlined in our
Terms of Service
, refunds are issued only if required by law.
Note:
If you purchased your subscription from the App Store,
contact Apple
to request a refund.
Related articles
How do I cancel my Grammarly subscription?
How does Grammarly charge my account?
